settings.heroheader_heading_text: Got a bold idea? Let's make it wearable.
settings.heroheader_paragraph_text: In our Design Your Own studio, you’re in the driver’s seat. Upload your artwork, tweak the details, and watch your vision come to life on Garage-grade premium stock that’s built to stand out.

settings.featurecard_paragraph_text: A tee, hoodie, mug, tote, or whatever suits your vibe. Every product is tried, tested, and print-approved by our crew. You won’t find blanks pulled from the bargain bin, here. No, sir. These are the same quality we use for national retail runs.

Upload your art. Add some words. Raid our design gallery if you’re feeling spicy. Shift it, stretch it, switch the colours — you call the shots. And with a live preview, you’ll know exactly how your merch will look before it hits the presses.

Once you’re happy with your design, we’re ready to roll. Your product is printed fresh in our Brisbane HQ, packed with care, and shipped with speed. Every step is managed by humans who know their stuff and caretake your merch like it's their first born.

settings.cta_heading_text: Trial one.  Wear one.  Gift one. You’re in control.
settings.cta_paragraph_text:
Select products in our Design Your Own range are available with no minimums, so you can test-drive your design before you go full send.

Create thoughtful, one-off gifts that still feel polished. Launch your first drop with zero pressure to bulk order. Get real feedback, refine, and relaunch like a pro.

Built for visionary creators, gifts-as-their-love-language-ers, and side-hustlers who want to dream big but start smart.

settings.products_heading_text: Start with a blank. End with a banger.
settings.products_paragraph_text: Soft, sturdy, and seriously wearable. These blanks are the unsung heroes behind your favourite fits.

settings.header_tagline_text: Make it personal. Make it wearable.
settings.header_paragraph_text:
The Design Your Own studio was made for the dreamers, gifters, side-hustlers and late-night tinkerers. The ones with big ideas, niche obsessions, and bold style that doesn’t come off a shelf.

Design gear that feels like you.

settings.contact_paragraph_text: Need a quote? Not sure what print method to roll with? Want to turn “meh” into magic? Whether you’ve got a fully-formed brief or just a sketch on a napkin, we’re here to help.
